author: Edward Morbius
comment: My original evaluation was overwhelmingly poor due to the stinging response received from the developer.  Another developer helped me to to not only fix their, but their solution helped me to fix Photo Shop Pro. This is a good app, but support stinks. Therefore 4 stars instead of 5.  I chalk this off to a poor understanding of culture and  angery frustration due to the developer's inability to communicate.

author: Elijah Gentry
comment: App does not work with Fossil Q and Galaxy s7. When you select the photo you want to send to my Fossil Q smartwatch. It does nothing. I read the comments about the app not working with the Gear s2 or s3, but not with the Fossil Q. Could not reach any support forum on the issue as well.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Our guess is you probably did not select one of the 3 watch faces provided. Here's some instructions to help (https://virtualgs.wordpress.com/android-wear/photo-watch-pro/) but give us an email so we can follow up directly with you!

author: TS
comment: Could you please tell me how to rotate my pictures? I've clicked on everything in the app and I still haven't been able to figure it out. Majority of the pictures I choose come out sideways even though they aren't that way in my gallery.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Can you send us the picture to check? One of the get around is to do some simple cropping, etc and resave the picture. Sometimes certain picture has wrong orientation encoded in the file itself.

author: Richard White
comment: [Sony smartwatch 3] Nice and simple way of selecting a photo from your phone (or Google photos) to display as your wallpaper on watch face. For five stars I would love to see it change pictures each morning.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! We will look into possibilities of uploading multiple photos.

author: Tracey Hartzog
comment: Ugraded my watch  it did not go to it try to rebuy it it would let cause said already have the ab can't  put my pictures  back on phone uggg

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: If you have purchased once in Google Play, you don't have to pay again for upgrade. If you have other issues, please contact us directly and we will help you.

author: Mazin Kaiser
comment: I bought this program TWICE (one for the watch S2 & one for the cell s7) and I still can't make it work. On the watch will not give me no type of options besides the minus sign and on the s7 I choose the picture click on the choices on top of the app and it doesn't do absolutely nothing. I'm so upset right now!!

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, did you read the description that this version is NOT designed for Gear S2 (or S3)? Please contact us and we will send you a working version in Galaxy Apps (where you should be getting your Gear apps from).

title: Doesn't work

author: jonathan dycus
comment: I can not get it to work on my Samsung gear S2. They said they would take care of it so I'm sure I'll update this app to 5 stars when they do!

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, this app is NOT designed for Gear S2 (check description). Please approach us to get a coupon to free Gear S2 version.

author: Jennifer Mize
comment: I had a app downloaded tag the looked like this. I guess this one doesn't work.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, what watch are you using? You are welcome to contact us on any issues. Here's the help page which might be of some help: https://virtualgs.wordpress.com/android-wear/photo-watch-pro/

author: Michelle Ryan
comment: I love it! Being able to use my own photos allows me to express my personality. Works fine on my Motorola 360 v2. Thanks, 😊

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback!

comment: it works. I wish the dev would update it to be a full aw 2.0 app, though. and some kind of option for it to change the image automatically would be nice, a la Muzei.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks, we will look into it. Full AW 2.0 version is available (Photo Watch 2) and we cannot update this one due to the need to support many AW1.x devices (many devices won't be updated). If you would like to support us and have a AW 2.0 watch, Photo Watch 2 is a complete rewrite that supports complications.

comment: Does not work with my fossil q

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, it should. Can you tell us what problems are you facing? You can directly give us an email or read this first: https://virtualgs.wordpress.com/android-wear/photo-watch-pro/

comment: Can't hide seconds on the photo digital watch face.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback.

reply.content: Did you got the issue solved? We tested and analog did work. Please send us an email and we will follow up with you.

comment: Amazing app really easy to use

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks for the comment!

comment: It does what it says but half of my pictures show up in wrong position and even rotating my photos does not help. They still show up wrong on watch

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: If possible, please sent those wrong position photos to us for testing.

title: It's ok

author: Eric Oakley Eakins
comment: I love that I can change my photo as often as I want, which I do daily. To the developers, thank you for your quick response to my request for help.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: It should. If it does not, try remove the phone copy and reinstall it.

title: My Favorite Watch Face

author: martin bentley
comment: Good idea to put your pictures as a watch face.but please add option to be able to rotate the pictures as mine come out side ways.tried in gallery on phone but still come out sideways.more options needed on cropping.other than that good app.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, the rotation should be automated. If you have issues with certain photos, can you send us a sample to test?

title: Photo watch face

author: Kimberly Laster Blunt
comment: The app is great and has lots of cool features to help you personalize your watch! I also want to recognize support who wrote me back immediately and consistently to answer any of my questions and to assist me with a minor problem! 5 star app and service!

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thank you. :)

title: Awesome app! Awesome service!

author: Hal Holley
comment: Love this app.

author: Leon LaSpina
comment: I really like how I can change the text and hand color to match the chosen photo. Some photos require cropping before they will look good on my watch, so it would be nice if they could be cropped right from within the app.    A number of stock images are displayed for me to choose from and some of these are really nice. But it would be great if after I choose my own image, it is added under the list of stock images or in a separate tab. This would make it easy to go back to a previously chosen photo. In  order to save space, it would be fine to just store a low resolution version of the image and then when I re-select a previously chosen watch face the watch could re-load the image from my mobile phone.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: We implemented your idea. The only restriction is that this is only temporary and will be revert back when the app restarted (to avoid photo management, add/remove photos from previous entries, etc - messy). Give it a try!

author: Raymond Szymborski
comment: Easy to use, worked on LG Urbane. Pitcure was easy to add, changed font and added a caption. Been looking for something like this. Great work.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks!

title: Fantastic so Far

author: Dr Rajeev Gupta
comment: I was wishing to put my family pics on watch face.  This app does that beautifully
title: .loving it

author: Jose Luis Galdamez
comment: This app is really good but I can't rotate my photos to portrait and we can't manually crop the photos if this is added in an update it would be awesome.
title: Great but

author: Adrian McKee
comment: Love this watchface but I wish that manual cropping was an option. Also selection of background for pics that do not fill all of the watchface would be great.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks and we will keep the feedback in mind.

title: Great except for a few small issues.

author: Pasha Pov
comment: Works like charm. I like it alot. The only thing is that if you want the photos to fit you have to crop them with another app.

comment: Wont work on gear s2. Kenya nairobi

comment: Best face app I've found for putting your pics on the watch face. Frequent updates with improved features. Great job!

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks! We treasured our feedback and will continue to improve the app!

reply.author: Virtual GS

title: needs time out option

author: Jason Warbelton
comment: Perfect balance of function and simplicity. Only thing missing is the ability for resizing text. Thanks.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thanks to your excellent idea, the new version now has the ability to set the text of ALL watch faces to one of the 3 sizes: small, normal and large.

title: Great app

author: JC Wilson
comment: I have Samsung Note 5 and Gear S2. I have dl the app from Gear Mananger App as you suggest and this app still is not working.  Will not send pictures, nor anything I select in app works.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: This app is for Android Wear as stated. You can contact us with your name/reason and we can send you a code to get it free from Gear Apps. Please tell us which country you are from.

title: H E L P

author: Dennis Whardo
comment: Works perfect on my Gear S2 paired with my s6 Edge. Been using watch and app for over a month without any problems. My only wish is for more watch faces that show battery level. Nice having picture of choice as a watch face. I recommend to anyone that wants to personalize their watch face.
title: Works great

author: Thomas Parker
comment: This is the only app I've found to display a picture on the phone while showing a clock.  So simple and perfect.  On a side note,  the technical support staff is awesome.  Id recommend this app to everyone.
title: Fantastic app!!!

author: Evan Raibstein
comment: Simple, and does what it says!
title: Love it!

author: Breana Norman
comment: I love that I have the options to wear whatever background I like. The company is very nice in helping me out as well. I love that they keep checking on me to make sure everything is working properly, and the respond to my questions so quickly.
title: Love it

author: mark greentree
comment: Excellent so far, thanks
title: LG G Watch R
